SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="ef1031afbeba4f0b93bfdfd66427cd4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hi,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal13"/]Sy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I like to consider myself an
expert in habitat ecology.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef1031afbeba4f0b93bfdfd66427cd4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When I heard an unknown planet had been
found,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my first thought was, "Unknown
planet means unknown creatures!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef1031afbeba4f0b93bfdfd66427cd4d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Who could resist an opportunity like that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Not me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's for sure![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef1031afbeba4f0b93bfdfd66427cd4d" Scale="1"/]I applied to join the research task force
as soon as I could.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="4850c3646e524f71825921eef6b6002c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This probably seems random,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I have
a request for the two of you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4850c3646e524f71825921eef6b6002c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm currently researching the connection
between the Pikmin and the whistles they
respond to.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have loads of questions![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4850c3646e524f71825921eef6b6002c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Like, how many Pikmin can you lead at a
time?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And will the whistle still work on all
your Pikmin if your squad increases?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4850c3646e524f71825921eef6b6002c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]And that's just the tip of the iceberg in
terms of what I want to know![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4850c3646e524f71825921eef6b6002c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]How about we just start out with you
telling me when your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]squad gets bigger[System:Color name="Default"],
and we'll go from there!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="13a3be3c4c6347c2a8363b6a48ab4aca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]How the what?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Are we actually twins
separated at birth?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="13a3be3c4c6347c2a8363b6a48ab4aca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Er,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] probably not.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="b4bd7ef7446740648f3ea9c00a21bf5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I get excited whenever I see you too![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're a rare breed of dog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="4d2d4666189046be958f6d5ca9050724" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Tell me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what's your planet's
ecosystem like?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d2d4666189046be958f6d5ca9050724" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Mm-hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Mm-hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Unfortunately,
I don't actually speak dog.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="34a2dc3e0a0345e7a589f8dd74e6eb13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Wow...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're incredible![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's amazing how
you can lead up to a hundred Pikmin now!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="0b660e7a80604017bd98e5c12b2b463f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I just gotta say it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You are one charismatic
leader, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="f0c5e011d1e54f2bb5c0e668b3d91e40" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I'm utterly stupefied![etc:Wait frame="8"/] HOW many Pikmin
do you lead now, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="0afc433bc0ea43ec8516590c1c670567" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Try to amass even more![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If anyone can
do it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="2c331fa2ae5f42e39cb0a4f919cc65da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Are you incredible, or what?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's amazing
how you can already lead up to a
hundred Pikmin!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="9ae3178c1845441f9c100e9bbac5a03a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You are one charismatic leader!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="9b034311c11f4883ad7f38b94e730908" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] No way![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You already lead that
many Pikmin?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Wow.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="b3090d4450ba4eaeb3318839fa8dc90d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm simply astonished at your abilities.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Try taking on even more!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="bb8a28958f5b43838f44fd9ee07827e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your whistle technique is beyond
impressive, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bb8a28958f5b43838f44fd9ee07827e1" Scale="1"/]Seems like you and the Pikmin have a
really great relationship.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="bf2f1cdc96dc4fb4b020e2667e6c9f97" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That Onion is incredibly prolific after
absorbing all that flarlic...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf2f1cdc96dc4fb4b020e2667e6c9f97" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Now I'd be extra tempted to give it
even more flarlicâ€”just to see what
would happen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="495b548905d441b8a6e34436016082c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I was talking to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal09"/]Pitunia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] from the task
force.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] She says the Onion may be artificial
or was intentionally created somehow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="495b548905d441b8a6e34436016082c4" Scale="1"/]But if the Onion's a living entity with its
own will and needs,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then doesn't that align
with it being a natural specimen?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="495b548905d441b8a6e34436016082c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Isn't it funny how two individuals can look
at the exact same thing and have two
entirely different perspectives?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="19a17696e8814651a7ebb57e68ed5c1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Pikmin always come back to you when they
hear your whistle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="19a17696e8814651a7ebb57e68ed5c1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]That means that Pikmin can identify
certain sounds![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="19a17696e8814651a7ebb57e68ed5c1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If one were able to link specific sounds
with Pikmin actions...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]you may find even
more ways to control the Pikmin.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="4edf27c3409f41fe9b99ebcab988f0ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When the Onion absorbs [Grammar:Decap/]Flarlic,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it
consistently increases the number of
Pikmin that you can take out at once.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4edf27c3409f41fe9b99ebcab988f0ae" Scale="1"/]Maybe the Onion is the one who determines
what's possible and issues its own orders...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4edf27c3409f41fe9b99ebcab988f0ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Wouldn't that indicate that the Onion has a
will of its own?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="db2c2afd08a44f93b77be2407cacdb6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Predators and prey.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] An ecosystem
can't function properly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or even exist,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
without both.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="db2c2afd08a44f93b77be2407cacdb6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But you can't think of it as something sad
or unfair.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a natural give-and-take
for them both.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="2cdfe0de26384f19a83e522a634f71bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The Pikmin slide down from inside the
Onion when you call for them from below.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2cdfe0de26384f19a83e522a634f71bc" Scale="1"/]That would mean both the Onion and
Pikmin can understand your call...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2cdfe0de26384f19a83e522a634f71bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]That Onion must have some kind of
thought process,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="c5ed33a2b3fd4d6d80f16b906e0f6297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's something I've come to realize
while watching you interact with your
cohort of Pikmin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5ed33a2b3fd4d6d80f16b906e0f6297" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They adore you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] They must see you as
a terrific and reliable leader.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="a3585af7140147f1b4a4c8b7fe849c59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]To be honest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd love to join you on your
missions and investigate all the creatures
I came here to see.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a3585af7140147f1b4a4c8b7fe849c59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I need to resist that urge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a3585af7140147f1b4a4c8b7fe849c59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I can't risk going out there and getting
into another accident.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't want to be
the cause of any more trouble.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="a225fa7f23b94ed98d622670af024f5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Alrighty![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now, why don't you start out slow
and aim to increase your Pikmin capacity
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]40[System:Color name="Default"]...
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="34f1e8f99b644890aa3d006bea2ad0f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the Onion grows whenever you give it some
flarlic.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Interesting![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34f1e8f99b644890aa3d006bea2ad0f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Look out for whitish bulbs while you're
out searching different areas!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="e9c15a3c32684903bc63c586894b8815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Pikmin always come back to you when they
hear your whistle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9c15a3c32684903bc63c586894b8815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]That means that Pikmin can identify
certain sounds![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e9c15a3c32684903bc63c586894b8815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If one were able to link specific sounds
with Pikmin actions...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]you may find even
more ways to control the Pikmin.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="17154345a82e47f780a802d4e395bfea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The number of Pikmin you can take out at
once is steadily growing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep it up![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Your
next goal is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]60[System:Color name="Default"]!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="9013da70d0d84858995f69699c324d59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When the Onion absorbs flarlic,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it
consistently increases the number of
Pikmin that you can take out at once.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9013da70d0d84858995f69699c324d59" Scale="1"/]Maybe the Onion is the one who determines
what's possible and issues its own orders...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9013da70d0d84858995f69699c324d59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Wouldn't that indicate that the Onion has a
will of its own?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="b8a92192a7ac4ed6872ee62056a98b3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]While exploring the different areas here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I got lost in my observations and forgot
to check my space suit's battery.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b8a92192a7ac4ed6872ee62056a98b3d" Scale="1"/]Then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] before I had a chance to act,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it went
into forced-sleep mode...
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="c0b5a71cbcfd4c8091f6f1b39a883d3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The number of Pikmin you can bring in your
squad continues to increase![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But can you
max it out at [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]80[System:Color name="Default"]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've got this!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="0e7150c28138409291d3d014b717e41d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Predators and prey.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] An ecosystem
can't function properly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or even exist,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
without both.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e7150c28138409291d3d014b717e41d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But you can't think of it as something sad
or unfair.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a natural give-and-take
for them both.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="c831c532d8594f5192b8bfc2705ded0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The Pikmin slide down from inside the
Onion when you call for them from below.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c831c532d8594f5192b8bfc2705ded0a" Scale="1"/]That would mean both the Onion and
Pikmin can understand your call...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c831c532d8594f5192b8bfc2705ded0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]That Onion must have some kind of
thought process,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then?
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="ee15a69306cb43aaa24b7d0a7dcb004f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]You're so close to being able to take out
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]100 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee15a69306cb43aaa24b7d0a7dcb004f" Scale="1"/]I'm overwhelmed just speaking those
words aloud.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I might even be more
pumped than you!
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="93ab371ad89d45f0860e7faa73f20822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's something I've come to realize
while watching you interact with your
cohort of Pikmin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="93ab371ad89d45f0860e7faa73f20822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They adore you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] They must see you as
a terrific and reliable leader.
SV011.SV011_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="b62f6fa0762d4d5d9bce776bdc349007" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]To be honest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd love to join you on your
missions and investigate all the creatures
I came here to see.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b62f6fa0762d4d5d9bce776bdc349007" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I need to resist that urge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b62f6fa0762d4d5d9bce776bdc349007" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I can't risk going out there and getting
into another accident.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't want to be
the cause of any more trouble.
